data.title: starrer Indian 2 gets its OTT release date. Details inside

data.text:
Kamal Haasan-starrer Indian 2 gets its OTT release date. Details inside

Indian 2 stars Kamal Haasan as Senapathy, a freedom fighter turned vigilante who fights against corruption. The sequel to the 1996 film of the same name hit the screen after nearly three decades.

By CNBCTV18.com

After its theatrical run, Kamal Haasan-starrer Indian 2 is now gearing up for its OTT debut. The sequel will be available on Netflix starting August 9, a month after it premiered in theatres. Earlier on August 4, Netflix shared a poster of the film along with the release date. It also announced that Indian 2 will be released in four languages -- Tamil, Telugu, Malayalam, and Kannada.

On X, formerly Twitter, Netflix wrote, “Thatha varaaru, kadhara vida poraaru. #Indian2 is coming to Netflix on 9 August in Tamil, Telugu, Malayalam and Kannada!” It also used the hashtag ‘#Indian2OnNetflix’ in the caption.

The sequel to the 1996 film of the same name hit the screens after nearly three decades. The original Indian film was also directed by Shankar. The 1996 venture featured Manisha Koirala, Urmila Matondkar, Sukanya, and Nedumudi Venu, among others.

The film was released in theatres on July 12 in Tamil, Telugu, and Hindi. Indian 2 stars Kamal Haasan as Senapathy, a freedom fighter turned vigilante who fights against corruption.

After its release, the film earned mixed responses from fans and the audience and collected around ₹148.81 crore at the box office.

Directed by S Shankar, the film has been co-produced by Lyca Productions and Red Giant Movies. Indian 2 also featured Siddharth, SJ Suryah, Rakul Preet Singh, Bobby Simha, Priya Bhavani Shankar, and Gulshan Grover, among others. The film's music was composed by Anirudh Ravichander.

The makers of Indian 2 are now working on the post-production of the third instalment.

Kamal Haasan and Shankar claimed that the Indian 3 is likely to be released six months after the release of Indian 2. However, an official announcement about the release date of Indian 3 is awaited.

(Edited by : Sudarsanan Mani )
